title: Passage (Ian MacTilstra, 2005) - Simultan Festival DVDRiP

Depicting glowing, irradiated creatures spinning repeatedly in a spiraling, circular motion, the filmÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s heavy mediation trivializes and alters memory to render it farcical and amusing, like truth slipping away in favour of a more interesting narrative.
